root.name: The Life of a Pacifist is Often Fraught With Conflict
root.description: OverviewThe Life of a Pacifist is Often Fraught With Conflict is a short visual novel developed by Bento Smile and released for PC, Mac, and Linux on May 31, 2010. The game follows a pacifist and his job at a game development company, where he abhors the violence that all of his coworkers relish in adding to the game. Like many of Bento Smile's visual novels, this game was created using the Ren'Py engine, contains multiple endings, and only takes around 10 minutes to finish one complete playthrough.The game is available for free from Bento Smile's website.
